summary:
Face the true nonsense of Skyrim !
Heimskr speaks now backwards
descriptionHtml:
I just did this for shits & giggles...i didn't even knew if i should upload this or not, but i digress.

This mod will make Heimskr speak backwards.
I made this so i actually have a reason to keep him alive and obviously to laugh my own ass off.


Installation: Drop data folder into your skyrim folder
Usage: Start the game, go to whiterun, laugh your ass off.

Uninstallation:
Delete the following files from your
(x86)SteamSteamAppscommonSkyrimDataSoundVoiceskyrim.esmmalenord directory

dialoguewh__0003b439_1.fuz
dialoguewh__0003b2c0_1.fuz
dialoguewh__0003b2bf_1.fuz
dialoguewh__0003adac_1.fuz

Have fun!
author: Heimskr
